ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 122
ygData.msgSnippet: ... So tell me what exactly is different about you?  What makes your version of Shut up and quit whining about it different than say, Stone s?  Why are you
ygData.messageBody:
> That's a very passive attitude. I believe that if you tell someone
> to take a look at themselves, and their posts from another
> perspective. Think before they post, about half the idiot posts would
> not be sent.
>
> If no one responds and complains about one bad email. The
> offender will
> just send another, and another, and another. Eventually someone
> (me) needs to tell that person that his e-mails aren't being
> productive
> and he is only hurting his own name, that person will stop or the
> emails will be a lot more well thought out.

So tell me what exactly is different about you? What makes your version of
"Shut up and quit whining about it" different than say, Stone's? Why are
you going to invoke a change than he, or any of the others won't? As you
say, it has been weeks, and it seemed to me that the thread had just about
petered out until a sudden, unnecessary inflamation.

Lei
Warrior-Poet
Bristlebain
